mapper.select: /* 상위 메뉴 */ SELECT menu.menu_id , menu.hr_menu_id , menu.menu_nm , menu.page_url , menu.icon_val , auth.read_auth_yn AS auth_yn , auth.cret_auth_yn , auth.read_auth_yn , auth.upd_auth_yn , auth.del_auth_yn , auth.expt_auth_yn , auth.priv_data_read_auth_yn FROM practice.sys_menu_info menu INNER JOIN practice.sys_mgr_auth auth ON menu.menu_id = auth.menu_id WHERE menu.use_yn = 'Y' AND menu.menu_cd = 'M' AND auth.mgr_grp_id = #{mgrGrpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND auth.read_auth_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY menu.ord_by_cls

/* 하위 메뉴 */ SELECT menu.menu_id , menu.hr_menu_id , menu.menu_nm , menu.page_url , menu.icon_val , auth.read_auth_yn AS auth_yn , auth.cret_auth_yn , auth.read_auth_yn , auth.upd_auth_yn , auth.del_auth_yn , auth.expt_auth_yn , auth.priv_data_read_auth_yn FROM practice.sys_menu_info menu INNER JOIN practice.sys_mgr_auth auth ON menu.menu_id = auth.menu_id WHERE menu.use_yn = 'Y' AND menu.menu_cd = 'P' AND menu.hr_menu_id = #{menuId , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND auth.mgr_grp_id = #{mgrGrpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY menu.ord_by_cls

/* 권한 조회 */ SELECT mgr.mgr_id , grp.mgr_grp_id , menu.menu_id , menu.menu_nm , auth.cret_auth_yn , auth.read_auth_yn , auth.upd_auth_yn , auth.del_auth_yn , auth.priv_data_read_auth_yn , auth.expt_auth_yn FROM practice.sys_mgr mgr INNER JOIN practice.sys_mgr_role rol ON mgr.mgr_id = rol.mgr_id INNER JOIN practice.sys_mgr_grp grp ON grp.mgr_grp_id = rol.mgr_grp_id INNER JOIN practice.sys_mgr_auth auth ON grp.mgr_grp_id = auth.mgr_grp_id INNER JOIN practice.sys_menu_info menu ON auth.menu_id = menu.menu_id WHERE grp.use_yn = 'Y' AND rol.use_yn = 'Y' AND menu.use_yn = 'Y' AND auth.use_yn = 'Y' AND mgr.mgr_id = #{mgrId , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND grp.mgr_grp_id = #{mgrGrpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND menu.page_url = #{pageUrl , jdbcType=VARCHAR}
